channel.title: Black Mesa: Source Anime Edition
channel.description:
Alright i will admit it, i found the mod a tad bit dull, after playing half life one through several times, it never brought anything to the table. So Replacing some models and some sounds from Anime may be more interesting.
I would rather this be a community development so this is why this thread exists. I want you guys to decide what anime npc model replaces what npc model ingame. Although you need to reference it with either a npc or playermodel that is already rigged in garrysmod.org or in another mod out there already! All i need to do is decompile it and apply the npc's orginal animations, it's no big deal.
I don't care much for ripping out sounds from anime games so i wouldn't mind people contributing sounds for a model replacement as barney npc sounds wouldn't work very well with the girl from lucky star... But hey this project is just to make things a tad bit whacky. It adds replay value to the mod.
Rokiahi wearing a gas mask. I have no idea what anime she is from however she seems to fit a replacement for a marine. [img]https://puu.sh/163Ct[/img]
Link added here: [url]https://www.mediafire.com/?9gefdnu7xkpd31c[/url]

item.title: Black Mesa: Source Anime Edition
item.dc:creator: harryhoot1
item.description:
Why is everyone acting like this guy installed this mod onto your computers by force? If you don’t like it, just move on.

I can hardly consider a little line of text on your screen that says “black mesa: source anime edition” to be shoving anime down your throats.

Read full topic

I’m… I don’t…
I’m a huge fan of anime, don’t get me wrong, but… I can’t even phrase what I want to say… My god, what have you done to BM?!

item.title: Black Mesa: Source Anime Edition
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
There’s sharing, then there’s shoving down peoples throats.

The latter is what your doing, especially evident by the fact that you migrated to facepunch, posted in the Black Mesa thread, then went so far as to make a new thread for what is essentially a skin pack, after nobody cared in the thread that you are supposed to post everything related to the mod in unless its something really big.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa: Source Anime Edition
item.dc:creator: Jethrosoup
item.description:
xalener:

This shit is the scum of Japanese entertainment. The animation that came from over there used to fucking mean something. It used to be something. Cowboy Bebop. Akira. Ghost in the Shell. Ninja Scroll. Even Dragonball (Z) when it was first starting. They were all masterfully crafted technical masterpieces in every aspect down to the writing. It was the STAPLE for top quality motion and shit that you could have sworn was rotoscoped, but wasn’t. It all influenced the shit we take for granted here on the western front… but this… this post 90s fucking shovel faced uninspired useless demon wing garbage has no place anywhere. It’s the Jersey shore of animation. It’s the worst of the most terrible fucking shitbucket of all the shitbuckets. If I sound personally offended, I fucking am. The very existence of this thread, the entire concept behind it’s inception is fucking abhorrent.

10/10 would read again

Edit:

Silverknight:

Alright i will admit it, i found the mod a tad bit dull, after playing half life one through several times, it never brought anything to the table. So Replacing some models and some sounds from Anime may be more interesting.

This is (hyperbolically) the worst thing I’ve ever read in my entire life.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa: Source Anime Edition
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

Just added P.S. bit, das’all /srs

Disappointing.

I am fine with anime in general, but doing this to something like Black Mesa is just a crime against all that is good in the world. Anime has it’s place, unfortunately that place is not in decommissioned missile complexes in the New Mexico desert.

IMO.
